title: Jun 12 2020
itunes:title: Jun 12 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Mark Steyn guest hosts for Rush on Open Line Friday. A message from Rush. Chazistan, The Caliphate of Woke. The FBI warns of a meme “National Kill a Cop Day.” Winston Churchill statue defaced with racist graffiti. An ignorant, know-nothing, and narcissistic society abolishes its history. Time to ditch the hypocritical sports leagues. D.C. mayor sued for BLM mural near White House. Western society is dying and where are the conservatives? Racism is dead because liberals made it a joke. Nancy Pelosi didn’t do her homework on Ashanti garb.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

The Pajama Boys canceled for not being sufficiently pro-BLM. Conservatives won’t stand up to our inherited society being destroyed. Lady Antebellum changes name to Lady A, name already taken by black blues singer. Pretending this is a normal election season. If Joe Biden can pull this off, the consultant-industrial complex will never need an actual candidate again. Trayvon Martin’s mom wants more police. The incapability of understanding how men and women lived. Stop pandering and stand up to the mob. You can be socially executed for insufficient enthusiasm for the left’s latest cause.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

We are all in this for Rush. Genetically modified mosquitoes to be released in United States. Spikes caused by protests hurt small business owners. Government is punishing law-abiding citizens and rewarding rioters. Only Judge Sullivan doesn’t want the Flynn case to be over. We’re seeing the failure of the state at all levels. This is not a good faith civil rights protest, it’s anarchy. Who is getting the donation money for BLM? Small business owner will move out of Washington due to prolonged lockdown.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
